bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXV (Nos 2426-2437). With a Contribution by R.P. Winnington-Ingram

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Lobel E. and E.G. Turner, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXV (Nos 2426-2437). With a Contribution by R.P. Winnington-Ingram. (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 36.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1959, 8°, xii-131 pp. et XIV pll.

C.R. par John Barns, JHS 81 (1961) p. 179. - William M. Calder III, VP56 (1961) pp. 277-279. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 21 (1960) p. 240. - Douglas D. Feaver, AJP 83 (1962) pp. 317-321. - Bruno Gentili, Gnomon 33 (1961) pp. 331-343 (avec addendum de Cesare Questa, pp. 343-345). - Hugh Lloyd-Jones, CR 11 (1961) pp. 17-21. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 35 (1960) Nos 69-70, pp. 285-289. - Hanna Swiderek, JJurP 14 (1962) pp. 156-158. - Edoardo Volterra, Iura 11 (1960) pp. 262-264. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 77 (1960) p. 574.
